function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited published research on COVID-19 and housing","Impact":"Uncertainty in applying recommendations, potential for ineffective measures","Mitigation":"Encourage and fund further research, consider broader implications of existing studies","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, funding for research","People":"Researchers, policymakers, architects, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, funding organizations"},{"Description":"Variation in terminology and categorization of housing types","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and analyzing relevant literature, potential for misinterpretation of findings","Mitigation":"Use multiple keywords and search strategies, consult experts from multiple disciplines, create a standardized terminology for cross-disciplinary research","Technologies":"Text mining and natural language processing tools, interdisciplinary collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, librarians, interdisciplinary experts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations, professional associations"},{"Description":"Cultural and contextual differences in study locations","Impact":"Inapplicability of findings to different cultural and geographical contexts, potential for misinterpretation of results","Mitigation":"Conduct location-specific studies, consider cultural and societal norms, involve local stakeholders in research and analysis","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, cross-cultural research methodologies","People":"Researchers, local community members, policymakers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, community organizations, government agencies"}]}
